config.title: AI Translate Configuration
config.modelType.desc: Select large model type (OpenAI or Gemini)
config.largeModelApi.desc: OpenAI API endpoint (Only effective in OpenAI mode, default: https://api.openai.com/v1)
config.largeModelName.desc: Model name (Gemini mode uses gemini-2.0-flash by default)
config.largeModelMaxTokens.desc: Max tokens (Only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.largeModelTemperature.desc: Temperature parameter (Only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.streaming.desc: Enable streaming (Only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.namingRules.default: Example: Automatically determined by AI based on language patterns
config.aiTranslate.customTranslatePrompt: Custom translation prompt, must include `${targetLang}` and `${content}` parameters
config.aiTranslate.customNamingPrompt: Custom naming prompt, must include `${variableName}`, `${paragraph}`, `${languageId}` parameters
config.aiTranslate.streaming: Enable streaming (Only effective in OpenAI mode)
config.aiTranslate.problemTranslateLang: Select the target language for translating diagnostic information in the problem panel; none means no translation
